title: Supermarket Simulator

controls: WASD / Arrow Keys: Move around.Shift: SprintMouse: Look around.E: Interact with objects, boxes, and chat with townsfolk.Left-Click: Stock your shelves with goods.Tab: Open your main menu to access building or cleaning tools.Esc: Opens the settings.M: Brings up the map.
content.howToPlay: Roam around the town until you see a vacant shop that calls your name. With your 10,000 coins, you can rent it on the spot and give it a creative name sign.Use the cleaning tool to wipe off dusty floors, pick up trash, and show off your store’s fresh look. Nobody likes shopping in a dirty market!Step outside and meet the local supplier. Trade with them for shelves, registers, and the first batch of items to sell. You can also invest in more advanced equipment as you level up and once you get your profits rolling.Arrange your shelves, place your checkout counter, and decorate the interior to match your vibe. Do you like bright, cheerful aisles or a cozy, hometown feel? It’s up to you.Order supplies through your menu. Boxes of products will appear outside your store. Bring them in, fill up your shelves, and watch your stock turn into big profits.Flip the sign from “Closed” to “Open,” and customers will stroll in. Being the cashier and calculating changes is fun, but you can keep the line moving fast at the cash register by hiring someone to do it for you. If you get tired go and sleep in the bed outside of your supermarket. It's crazy but real!With your growing success, why stop at one store? Use your savings to rent a second location and spread your supermarket empire around town.
content.developer: Supermarket Simulator is developed by FreezeNova, known for creating other exciting browser games.

fullContent: Home› SimulatorSupermarket SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenEver walked into your local Walmart and thought, “Wow, it would be awesome to run a place like this”? Now you can, thanks to Supermarket Simulator on OnlineGames.io! You’ll start off with a whopping 10,000 coins, so you’re already on your way to creating the supermarket of your dreams. Think of all the gum, candy bars, and snacks you could buy with that! But here, you’re not just shopping, you’re the one behind the counter, the cashier, the shelf-stocker, the floor-sweeper, the box-carrier, and probably even the person who forgot to order more donuts. From picking the perfect location for your supermarket to hiring friendly employees, updating price tags to ordering new batch of goods, every decision is up to you. This free online game is your chance to build, manage, and have fun all at once.ControlsWASD / Arrow Keys: Move around.Shift: SprintMouse: Look around.E: Interact with objects, boxes, and chat with townsfolk.Left-Click: Stock your shelves with goods.Tab: Open your main menu to access building or cleaning tools.Esc: Opens the settings.M: Brings up the map.How to Play Supermarket SimulatorRoam around the town until you see a vacant shop that calls your name. With your 10,000 coins, you can rent it on the spot and give it a creative name sign.Use the cleaning tool to wipe off dusty floors, pick up trash, and show off your store’s fresh look. Nobody likes shopping in a dirty market!Step outside and meet the local supplier. Trade with them for shelves, registers, and the first batch of items to sell. You can also invest in more advanced equipment as you level up and once you get your profits rolling.Arrange your shelves, place your checkout counter, and decorate the interior to match your vibe. Do you like bright, cheerful aisles or a cozy, hometown feel? It’s up to you.Order supplies through your menu. Boxes of products will appear outside your store. Bring them in, fill up your shelves, and watch your stock turn into big profits.Flip the sign from “Closed” to “Open,” and customers will stroll in. Being the cashier and calculating changes is fun, but you can keep the line moving fast at the cash register by hiring someone to do it for you. If you get tired go and sleep in the bed outside of your supermarket. It's crazy but real!With your growing success, why stop at one store? Use your savings to rent a second location and spread your supermarket empire around town.Run Your Own SupermarketYou can discover all the tiny secrets and tricks yourself in Supermarket Simulator. But we've gathered every little detail and insider tip here. So you can turn your small-town shop into a booming business faster than Walmart opens new stores! Just remember to follow the these steps:Pick every detail from the store name to the shelf placement. Show off your personal taste.Get to know the town’s seller. They offer the best deals on goods to help your market stand out. But some goods will be unlocked as you level upWhen an item sells like crazy, stock up more. Less popular items might just collect dust on the shelves, lower their prices to sell them faster.Bring in a cashier or cleaning staff to handle the busywork while you focus on making big decisions. The cleaning staff will work in both stores if you open the branch.If your store is jam-packed, it might be time for a tiny price bump. If it’s empty, consider lowering prices.Nobody wants to shop in a messy store. Sweep floors, pick up trash, and keep everything looking great.Take a stroll outside, chat with folks, and enjoy that small-town charm while your staff is racking up the profits for you.DeveloperSupermarket Simulator is developed by FreezeNova, known for creating other exciting browser games.Explore Tycoon GamesIf you’re itching for more management fun after playing this online game, check out other popular simulators on OnlineGames.io. Love building up your own empire? You might enjoy Idle Startup Tycoon or any of our other free games that let you test your business smarts.Now’s your chance to step up and show everyone you’ve got what it takes to run the coolest supermarket in town. Ready to rack up those sales and become the ultimate store manager? Play Supermarket Simulator now on OnlineGames.io and dive into a world where you call all the shots!This article was updated on March 12, 20251 Player3DFreeOrganizingSimulatorTycoonUnity
